assets_visuels.Nom: Décor - Gouffre vers le Nexus Synaptique
assets_visuels.Prompt: 2D environmental concept art in high angle of very dark clautrophobic and horrific underground cave that descend deep into darkness. The cave slowly turns more and more organic, ending into pulsing pinkish orange flesh, similar to the insides of a living being. In the distance, there is an open gaping flesh made pit encircling a dark hole.
assets_visuels.Lieux: Strate IV - Le Nexus Synaptique, Plis d’ossements

assets_visuels.Prompt: Side view of an underground sanctuary. On the wall, an engraving represents a giant creature with vast wings and hundreds of elongated tentacles sprouting from the bottom of its body are reaching out for the pillars on both sides, a small refined ruby is subtly embedded in its chest, while magical runes circle above it. The tentacles of the engraving reach far away to the pillars.  In the middle ground, a few steps lead up to a cubic altar of polished stone on which sits an ornate golden box covered by a magnificent green scarf. the floor itself is made of sand, as if the scene were set in the middle of the desert. The ivory walls on the sides are in arab architecture. Smooth white tentacles climb on the pillars. A narrow arched passage leads deeper into the darkness on the left, while carved steps descend on the right. The whole scene exudes solitude and temporal mystery. A dim light comes from the ceiling.
assets_visuels.Lieux: Strate III - Les Catacombes Temporelles, Plis d’ossements

assets_visuels.Prompt: Concept art of a landscape : stone arcade above the necropolis, carved from dark bone‑stone. Chunky square pillars, broad semicircular arches, and a waist‑high parapet overlooking tiered tomb roofs and narrow stairs below. Floor slabs are cracked and sand‑dusted; a single hanging banner with simple glyphs marks the checkpoint. Warm late‑afternoon light enters from the right, throwing long shadows across the corridor. Over‑the‑shoulder midshot from behind @uresair : a smooth glass mask with an emerald halo, layered robe with geometric trim, shoulders squared. Facing her stands the gatekeeper, a tall non‑human wearing a large painted mask with ash‑gray skin and elongated neck tendons. They wear a heavy sand‑colored robe with a deep hood and a broad leather belt; simple bone bangles at the wrist. The gatekeeper blocks the passage, holding a stout black‑wood staff, one open hand raised while speaking. background remains clean and readable. Painterly, warm side light.
assets_visuels.Notes: Dialogue OTS sous arcades. Base pour slide Dialogue.

Under a rock sky inside the Leviathan’s nave, bone‑stone floor and ritual pillars. Low‑angle wide shot. @uresair2  stands left foreground, back to camera: faceless glass mask with emerald halo, flowing robe, light rings pulsing around wrists. Akthar‑Neth faces her at mid‑distance: very tall Van’Doei, emaciated, ash‑gray skin, one arm missing, long robe inscribed with symbols. Between them a single circular arena mark glows, like a sanctified boundary. Three tall stone steles around the space show vertical amber slits, acting as encounter markers. Dust rays cut across the scene. Painterly, high readability.
assets_visuels.Notes: Duel unique Uresaïr vs Akthar‑Neth, mise en scène encounter.

assets_visuels.Prompt: Wayside hospice carved into a low bone‑stone hall. Midshot. Uresair lies bandaged on a simple bed. A gigantic local in robes wearing painted abstract mask offer water, they appear very tall have stranged deformed monstruous proportions but are friendly. One of their arm is monstruously hypertrophied. Light comes from a line of bone‑lamps along the wall and a small brazier near the cot. Painterly, resilient mood.@uresair
assets_visuels.Notes: Hospice souterrain, recovery après défaite (no fail state).

assets_visuels.Prompt: A concept art with glitches. Inner mindscape of a fallen god: a vast, silent chamber. Floors are smooth dark glass shot through with emerald cracks that pulse. floating slabs drift at different heights like stalled thoughts. In the center, an insanely gigantic enormous translucent memory orb hovers, showing an ancient desert. It seems a dozen times bigger than the character :Uresair stands below the orb at the center;showing her back, her white layered monk robe with a hood steady. Above her, a dark ghost appears as a transparent and barely visible alien phantom with slow curling tendrils, hovering protectively and pointing toward the orb. Around them, ribbons of light descend from the black ceiling. Distant rings of suspended sand swirl. The space feels ordered yet wounded, calm yet stuck in time. Painterly, clear composition.
assets_visuels.Notes: Mind‑orb intérieur de la déesse déchue, avec silhouette de l’Éthérée.

Introduction._general: Lien vers le moodboard : Firefly Boards

Le Cœur de la Vision : \"L'Excentricité._general: Au centre, là où tout converge : l'étrangeté comme habillage de la réalité. Un monde totalement alien, riche en couleurs vives mais nobles, qui éveille l'enthousiasme de l'exploration et la profondeur dramatique. Principes visuels fondamentaux : Émotion dominante : L'enthousiasme, la fascination, l'émerveillement devant l'étrange. Pas l'oppression ni la terreur, mais le plaisir de découvrir des paysages hors du temps et des créatures extraordinaires. Palette : Spectre complet avec richesse chromatique. Couleurs vives sans être fluos ou criardes — saturation contrôlée et noble. Pas de pilier identitaire unique (bleus profonds, verts riches, rouges intenses comme fondations, mais cyan, magenta, rose acceptés en accents). Profondeur et variété maximales. Clair-obscur cosmique : Pas le baroque classique qui illumine la chair beige. Un clair-obscur qui révèle les profondeurs de la jungle et les confins de l'espace — lumières étranges sur des formes inconnues. L'alien omniprésent : TOUT Alteir est alien. Pas un accent, pas un élément isolé, mais la nature même du monde. La variété est essentielle. Détail et complexité : Hyperdétail de type gravure (référence Gustave Doré). Chaque texture définie, structures infiniment complexes et lisibles. Pas de flou artistique ou de suggestion. Jamais simpliste ou minimaliste.

1. Biopunk ⇒ Fantastique._general: Transition : Dark Fantasy L'organique devient divin et mystérieux. On quitte la technologie viscérale pour le sacré. Artistes : Peter Mohrbacher (Angelarium), Wayne Barlowe.

2. Fantastique ⇒ Réalisme._general: Transition : Romantisme Le grandiose et la nature envahissent le béton et la structure. Le mythe s'ancre dans la matière lourde. Artistes : John Martin (Pandemonium), Simon Stålenhag, Jean Renaudie.

3. Réalisme ⇒ Surréalisme._general: Transition : Surréalisme photographique (réalisme métaphorique) La réalité tangible commence à se tordre, à suivre une logique de rêve tout en gardant une texture photographique. Artistes : Erik Johansson (le pivot), Jeremy Geddes, Vladimir Kush.

4. Surréalisme ⇒ Biopunk._general: Transition : New Weird Le rêve se solidifie pour devenir une biologie et une technologie étrangère, un écosystème alien. Artistes : Kilian Eng, Scavengers Reign.

Inspirations Principales._general: Références Vidéoludiques Octopath Traveler Personnages et monstres Legend of Mana Arrière-plans peints à la main en vue top-down (moins cartoon) Vanillaware (Odin Sphere, Dragon's Crown, Muramasa the Demon Blade, Unicorn Overlord) Arrière-plans détaillés et opulents Saturation riche et noble (pas criarde) avec précision technique des sprites Complexité visuelle et profondeur Sea of Stars[1] Pixel art ultra-HD avec éclairage dynamique en temps réel Animations fluides à haute cadence tout en conservant la lisibilité du pixel art SaGa Frontier 2[2] Décors peints à la main (référence technique, palette à enrichir) Côté surréaliste (l'Œgg) Puissance froide et dérive vers la tyrannie (Gustav XIII) Note : Trop désaturé/aquarelle pour Alteir, mais bon exemple de monde coloré Transistor[3] UI mentale sur fond sombre avec éléments flottants Réseaux de lignes et nœuds lumineux Sensation que l'interface appartient au personnage Autres jeux Persona 5 : Esthétique saturée et stylisée (sans le fluo urbain) Code Geass : Échelle monumentale Planescape Torment : Profondeur narrative des environnements Magic: The Gathering (Zendikar, Kaladesh) : Variété des biomes alien, couleurs vives et naturelles, richesse des textures Références Cinématographiques & BD Dune de Jodorowsky (non réalisé) Audace visuelle et excentricité Ambition monumentale sans tomber dans le ridicule Moebius (Jean Giraud) Couleurs vives mais nobles Détail extrême et complexité Alien omniprésent et varié Clair-obscur cosmique Michael Whelan (sans le côté rétro) Semi-réalisme technique avec étrangeté SF Richesse chromatique (palette plus noble que Dali) Structures organiques et architecturales détaillées Note : Aspect rétro/fluo à atténuer pour Alteir Roger Dean (sans le côté rétro) Organicité monumentale colorée Structures naturelles impossibles Palette riche (bleus, verts profonds) Note : Aspect rétro/fluo à atténuer pour Alteir Gustave Doré Niveau d'hyperdétail gravé (référence technique) Complexité architecturale et organique infinie Chaque élément défini et lisible Transposer en couleur pour Alteir Hayao Miyazaki (décors de Nausicaä, Princesse Mononoke) Enthousiasme devant l'alien-jungle Couleurs vives, organicité luxuriante Fascination plutôt que terreur Crédibilité écologique des environnements Horizon Zero Dawn Semi-réalisme technique crédible Nature alien qui reprend ses droits Couleurs vives mais ancrées dans la réalité

Introduction._general: A black-and-white clean professional concept art sheet shows three vermine creatures with very different body shapes and silhouettes. Each is drawn with detailed linework and tonal shading. All share multiple large eyes, proboscis, and hunched digitigrade posture, but with highly varied leg anatomy. Each character is clearly labeled with its name. These are the only labels.  The Tide-Merchant (left) – Appears broad and heavy due to multiple layers of flowing robes with maritime patterns. Deep hood hides most their face, only a short proboscis emerges. Thick digitigrade legs visible below robes. Hands emerging from sleeves with extremely long claws, one of them holds a purse and the other touches their proboscis.  The Wall-Keeper (center) – Tall, wrapped in countless fabric layers making them seem massive and shapeless. A large hat covers his face and cast a shadow on his frame, as only a long proboscis emerges. Long spindly legs barely visible. He holds a large set of keys in his claws from voluminous sleeve.  The Cave-Runner (right) – Standing alert as if ready to run, small frame, wearing minimal torn vest exposing thin hunched anatomy. Elongated head, multiple huge reflective eyes, impossibly long proboscis hanging down to their waist, round features. Extremely long legs show extreme digitigrade bend with elongated foot bones. Pale fur visible on exposed limbs, with two tails.  The sheet includes head side views, and items and fabric draping focus. They all appear mysterious and somehow cute. White paper background. Draw inspiration from the given images. A black-and-white clean professional concept art sheet shows three vermine creatures with distinct morphologies and clothing styles. Each is drawn with detailed linework and tonal shading. All share multiple large eyes, proboscis, and hunched digitigrade posture, but with highly varied anatomations. Each character is clearly labeled with its name. These are the only labels.  The Storm-Watcher (left) – Tall lean silhouette under tattered weather cloak flapping in wind. Hood frames gaunt angular face with small clustered eyes and thick muscular proboscis curled upward with tusks. Strong reverse-jointed legs with massive clawed feet gripping the ground. One hand shields eyes from imagined wind. Meteorological instruments hangs at his belt. Parallel scars across exposed chest. Spiral motives on fur.  The Depth-Sage (center) – Appears enormous and rotund under layered academic robes covered in carved symbols. Face completely hidden in shadow under wide hood, only serpentine proboscis as thick as an arm emerging and coiling. Just one skeletal hand visible holding ancient tablets, wearing multiple rings. Impossible to guess true body size beneath. Mysterious imposing presence.  The Outcast (right) – Crouched defensive posture, medium frame in ragged patched clothes. Wildly asymmetric face with three eyes of different sizes, bent broken proboscis, many scars. One leg shorter than the other creating limping stance. Patchy fur, a big curved horn emerging from skull. Arms crossed protectively. Zebra fur.  The sheet includes head side views, close-ups, items and draping focus. They all appear mysterious and somehow cute. White paper background. Draw inspiration from the given images. A black-and-white clean professional concept art sheet shows three vermine creatures from different social contexts. Each is drawn with detailed linework and tonal shading. All share multiple large eyes, proboscis, and hunched digitigrade posture, but with highly varied anatomations. Each character is clearly labeled with its name. These are the only labels.  The Negotiator (left) – Draped in ornate flowing robes making them appear bulky and round. Small delicate face visible under decorated hood—six tiny gentle eyes arranged in spiral, elegant curved proboscis with pierced rings. Thin graceful arms making elaborate hand gestures with impossibly long delicate fingers. Heavy silk-like fabric contrasts with visible refined features. Floral patterns on exposed fur patches.  The Scavenger (center) – Compact muscular body under patchwork hooded cloak made of mismatched fabrics. Two pairs of intense eyes, a short aggressive proboscis with notched scars emerges from his scarf. Powerful thick legs crouched low ready to pounce. Holds salvaged blade in clawed hand, other hand flat on ground. Alert dangerous posture. Battle scars across visible limbs.  The Incubator-Priest (right) – Completely obscured by ceremonial white fabrics creating massive ghostly flowing form. Large ornate hat towers above casting deep shadow. Only lower portion of serene face visible—calm half-closed eyes, elegant proboscis hanging straight down with ritual paint marks. Extremely long backward-bent legs extend from robes like stilts. One hand raised in blessing gesture barely visible through fabric layers. Geometric symbols embroidered on robes.  The sheet includes head side views, close-ups, items and draping focus. They all appear mysterious and somehow cute. White paper background. Draw inspiration from the given images.

Introduction._general: A black-and-white concept art sheet shows three new members of the same species with very different poses, heights, and body shapes. Each is drawn with detailed anatomical linework and tonal shading, emphasizing organic, sculptural forms while keeping the shared features — elongated limbs, smooth faces, and fluid anatomical surfaces. Each character is labeled with its name.  The Warden (left) – massive and broad, hunched forward as if carrying great weight. Thick layered plates cover the shoulders and arms like natural armor. Its hands drag the ground, fingers forming dripping claws. The head is low and recessed into the chest, with small sensory slits.  The Acolyte (center) – tall, slender, and asymmetrical, with arms around their chest. They wear long decorated robes. Long filaments hang from its wrists and spine, swaying like banners. Its head has a hollow crown-like basin.  The Harbinger (right) – mid-height, slightly twisted posture. The body shows partial freezing — fragments of ice forming along the ribs and forearms. It wears a thin harness of hardened resin and net hanging on the ground. Their cranial basin splits into two asymmetrical lobes.  The sheet includes small anatomical notes around the figures — hand sketches, material drips, and head details — reinforcing the study aspect. White paper background, inspired by @img1   without direct reproduction. A black-and-white concept art sheet shows three members of the same species with very different poses, height and shape. Each figure highlights a distinct morphology and function, while preserving the core features. Each character is labeled with its name.  The Wanderer left  – lean and slightly hunched, wearing a tattered organic cloak fused to its back and a belt made of braided tendrils and a hood covering its enlarged head.  The Arbiter center  – extremely tall, muscular and heavy, with layered armor plates, faulds and a collar. Holds a staff, posture frontal and imposing. Small cranial basin.  The Seer right  – very small height, transparent cape. Wears thin cords, raising a hand. Oversized head basin. The layout includes small sketches of limbs and items.  Draw inspiration from @img1 without reproducing exactly this character. White paper background

Introduction._general: A black-and-white clean professional concept art sheet shows three Van'Doei creatures with very different body types. Each is drawn with detailed linework. All share cracked skin and asymmetric anatomy. Each character is clearly labeled with its name. These are the only labels.  The Heat-Watcher left – Skeletal emaciated frame, asymmetrical, massively hypertrophied massive leg and arm. Dark anthracite grey skin with white cracks. Tattered robes, portable brazier on back with smoke. Big tribal mask with paintings. Extremely long hair-tendrils reaching ground like cape. Ritual scars covering exposed skin. Prayer beads in his small hand. Hunched forward reaching toward warmth.  The Cartographer center – Athletic lean build, hypertrophied right arm holding maps. Medium ashen grey skin with fine cracks. Minimal travel gear with metal studs, navigation tools at belt. Simple mask with Concentric patterns. Medium hair-tendrils tied back. Burn-marked gauntlets. Crouched low over ground tracing. Fire-starting kit visible.  The Indebted right – Muscular broad frame, extremely hypertrophied tentacled arm covered in cutting scars. Pale chalky white skin with large cracks. Torn leather apron, spiked collar and bracers. Angular geometric mask covers face completely. Short hair-tendrils barely past shoulders. Standing tall upright. Artisan tools and ash pouch at belt.  The sheet includes mask details, scar patterns, tools focus. They all appear mysterious and imposing. White paper background. Draw inspiration from the given images. Enormously hypertrophied left arm divided in two at the elbow and wrapped in preservation bandages. Wears ceremonial robes with religious symbols. Smooth featureless mask completely covers face. Wild electric hair-tendrils crackling. Bestial erratic stance weighting on giant closed hand. Wrapped in restraining belts around torso.  The Whisperer (right) – Androgynous lean athletic build. Medium ashen grey with intricate scarification maps. One arm is an armor-likeprosthetics and has a huge blade coming out of its elbow, like @img6 . Wears concealing hooded cloak covered in heretical texts. Mask with speaker grilles for modified vocal communication. Long braided hair-tendrils with hidden scrolls. Alert suspicious posture.   They all appear unsettling and mysterious. White paper background. Draw inspiration and use the style from the image the image. Elaborate mask with a long nose covering all face. Long white braided tendril hair. Female looking.  The Rapturous right – Their arm is segmented whip-like appendage coiling around character, covered in sharp metal barbs and blades embedded in flesh, actively wrapping around torso.
